name: Water Sort - Perfect Pouring
description:
Try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors in the same glass. The number of tubes and watercolors increases at every level of the game. Apply your gaming skills to arrange the same colors in one glass and the game.

How to play!
• Tap any glass tube that you want to pour the color water on top to others.
• Drag and pour water to match them in a logic puzzle way.
• Complete the game when all the same color water is into a glass.

Futures of Water Sort:
- Easy to control the game.
- One finger control.
- No time limit.
- Simple and easy UI/UX
- Stunning graphic.
- Solve the logic puzzle by color matching sills.
- Many levels do you try.
- Increased number of water and glasses to make continuous levels challenging.
- FREE & EASY TO PLAY.

Download and launch Water Sort. Let's take this challenge now!
